backend/DirectionType.mo: Defines a simple enum-like type with up and down variants.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing market data storage, user preferences, caching, and filtering with placeholder Binance fetch logic.
backend/MarketData.mo: Defines MarketData with symbol, price, volume, and direction fields.
backend/Theme.mo: Defines a Theme type with darkNeon and cyberGlow variants.
backend/UserPreferences.mo: Defines user preference types including favourites, theme, alerts, language, and input with principal.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with extensive PWA, iOS splash, and icon metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining icons, shortcuts, metadata, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v9 handling install, activate, caching, and fetch logic for PWA assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing tabs, service worker updates, learning engine init, URL sync, and online status.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformancePan: Shows AI learning stats for one or multiple assets, including levels, accuracy, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Catches app-wide errors, displays a recovery UI, and clears caches before reloading.
frontend/src/components/AssetResearch.ts: Provides asset search, symbol autocomplete, and detailed asset data retrieval from Binance.
frontend/src/components/DataStatusIndica: Displays live data status, errors, stale indicators, and retry options based on query metadata.
frontend/src/components/DynamicAlerts.ts: Generates real‑time radar and recommendation alerts with cooldown, filtering, and auto‑dismiss behavior.
frontend/src/components/Opportunities.ts: Renders categorized trading opportunities with tabs, loading and error states, and a details side panel. Manages modality selection and displays opportunity cards with live freshness info.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityDetai: Shows detailed info for a selected trading opportunity including price, market data, and trade recommendations. Provides a closeable side panel UI with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/OrderBook.tsx: Displays futures and spot order book depth with formatting, refresh controls, and categorized error messaging. Supports aggregation levels and backend fallback indicators.
frontend/src/components/PredictiveConfid: Renders a confidence meter for predictive analysis with dynamic colors, badges, and compact or full layouts.
frontend/src/components/PWADiagnosticsVi: Runs and displays PWA diagnostics such as display mode, install prompt status, and readiness. Shows statuses with icons, color coding, and refresh capability.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Dialog guiding users through installing the PWA, with platform-specific instructions and install actions. Supports iOS manual install steps and automatic browser-triggered installation.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallStatus: Displays PWA install status, device support info, and actionable install guidance using badges and conditional UI states.
frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.t: Implements the main radar view with market data, alerts, filters, learning indicators, and persisted user settings.
frontend/src/components/ResetFromScratch: Confirmation dialog that wipes local data, shows progress, and reloads the app after a full reset.
frontend/src/components/TabFetchErrorSta: Displays detailed fetch errors for tab content with reload actions and PWA cache warnings.
frontend/src/components/TabPageCard.tsx: Generic card layout wrapper for tab pages with icon, title, description, and children content.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides theme context and manages switching between stored themes by applying corresponding document classes.
frontend/src/components/TopRecommendatio: Displays top asset recommendations by combining live market data with recommendation scores, handling loading and error states, and rendering detailed cards for each asset.
Provides UI for user settings including theme, alerts, favorites, and PWA diagnostics, persisting preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/analysisEnric: Generates enriched technical analysis for a ticker with confidence scoring, trend detection, learning-engine adjustments, manipulation zone detection, and institutional order signals.
Fetches Binance Futures market data and individual asset tickers with error classification and handling for network and API restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/binanceFuture: Retrieves funding rates and open interest for Binance Futures symbols with partial-failure tolerance and in-memory metrics history support.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/institutional: Implements institutional signal detection from BTC market data and provides React Query hooks to fetch and analyze spot and futures Binance data with fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/learningInteg: Provides functions to record and update learning-engine predictions, prioritizing favourite symbols and applying configurable confidence thresholds.
Generates trading recommendations and radar alerts using adaptive baselines, volatility checks, and multiple anomaly detectors.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/opportunityRu: Defines deterministic scoring rules to select scalping and swing trading opportunities based on volume, volatility, momentum, and confidence metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/orderBookDept: Fetches and parses Binance order book depth with detailed error classification and React Query hooks for futures and spot depth data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/unifiedSnapsh: Transforms backend unified snapshots into enriched market data with safe numeric parsing and advanced technical analysis integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages AuthClient lifecycle, and exposes identity, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Calculates grouped trading opportunities using Binance market data and rule-based selectors.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWADiagnostics.ts: Runs PWA environment checks including display mode, service worker, manifest, and icon status to report issues.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks installability state, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and provides install/dismiss actions for PWA.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query hooks for Binance data, technical analysis enrichment, recommendation generation, and learning integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarSensitivity.t: Manages radar sensitivity presets with localStorage persistence and cross-tab synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates and exposes a method to trigger activation and reload.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeRecommendatio: React hook that selects market data for a symbol and modality and computes a trade recommendation using memoization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables, dark themes, and animated neon/cyber background styles.
frontend/src/lib/learningEngine.ts: IndexedDB‑backed learning engine that stores predictions, updates asset stats, manages config, and supports full DB reset.
frontend/src/lib/orderBookDepth.ts: Utility functions to parse, aggregate, and analyze order book depth, including wall detection and metric computation.
frontend/src/lib/radarFilters.ts: Manages radar filter settings with localStorage persistence, including anomaly type selection and thresholds.
frontend/src/lib/radarSensitivity.ts: Defines radar sensitivity presets, policies, and localStorage persistence for selecting and applying alert thresholds.
frontend/src/lib/resetFromScratch.ts: Provides full app reset by clearing IndexedDB, caches, service workers, and localStorage, plus helpers for reload and status.
frontend/src/lib/tradeRecommendation.ts: Defines trade recommendation types and computes entry/TP/SL and direction based on market data, modality parameters, and technical analysis.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and container settings for styling.
project_state.json: Stores project state, features, issues, and requirements for implementing trade recommendations in the Opportunities area.
